document_data.caption: A map showing Mount Talath in northwest Halruaa.
document_data.name: Mount Talath
document_data.mainbody: '''Mount Talath''' was the name of one of the tallest mountains in the western half of the [[Nathaghal Mountains|Nathaghal range]] of [[Halruaa]]. It was the site of the [[High Temple of Mystra]] and one of the largest collections of magic in all [[Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Notable Locations:
; High Temple of Mystra
: This was sometimes said to be the very center of magic in Halruaa.
; [[Mount Talath (town)|Mount Talath]]
: "Mount Talath" was also the name of the village built on its slope that housed the staff of the temple.
; [[Talathgard]]
: This fortress defended the mountain, the town, the temple, and even [[Talath Pass]] to the south.
